title: Senior Full Stack Developer (Backend & DevOps)
description:
Your day-to-day responsibilities include:

- Work with Product and Design team to define and prioritize workload, for yourself.
- Be part of all-senior development team, work and support one another.
- Own and implement service features across subsystems.
- Maintain code and write unit tests.

We’re looking for an experienced senior developer who is comfortable working independently and professionally. You don’t have to be talkative but frequent online communication is required.
requirements:
- At Least 4 years in Ruby on Rails developer
- At Least 2 years in DevOps background 
- Experience with web front-end such as HTML, JavaScript, CoffeeScript, CSS, SASS, jQuery.
- Experience with RESTful API
- Experience with Git
- Experience with Firebase, Google Services
- Experienced with RDBMS Postgres and In-memory db Redis
- Experience in Cloud platform, Docker/containerization and Docker swarm
- Troubleshooting system and network problems and diagnosing and solving software faults on cloud environments.
